<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["message"],"properties":{"message":{"type":"string","example":"Show me sales trends for Q4"},"data_source_id":{"type":"string"},"conversation_id":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
